542120.name: Win Big Or Die
542120.description:
As an Steam approved educational project, Win Big or Die was created by a team of programming students over a period of 5 months at Full Sail University.

Win Big or Die! is a third-person shooter that takes place on the distant planet of Swaria. You were born into slavery and the only way to escape is to fight in a game show. You must survive to win fame, fortune and your freedom.
542120.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
